name: Journey to the Light (gtilelli)
description:
You wake up in an underground facility, remembering only you were captured by enemy soldiers. You have to escape!

First Person Shooter with WASD and mouse controls, space jumps and mouse wheel chenges gun. Esc brings the menu screen.

There are three guns: AK47, shootgun and pistol, the smaller the gun faster it is, but causes less damage.

The downloadable file includes source code for Unity. 

The executable is inside the JourneyToTheLight\Build directory.
